name: Docudesk
overview:
Docudesk is a software company with headquarters in Allen, Texas. Docudesk offers innovative desktop software, web applications, and server solutions at the forefront of electronic document and PDF software.

Docudesk is leveraging its experience in PDF’s with DocQ.com - an online “business center” to provide secure PDF storage, sharing, publishing, digital signatures, and annotations. The goal of DocQ is to provide a single venue for securely managing important documents, such as contracts and forms, and give unprecedented control over how they are shared with clients as well as collaborators.
